title: The First Heist - The Rebel Thief, Episode 2
itunes:title: The First Heist - The Rebel Thief, Episode 2
description:
In Episode 2 of this six-part series, Alexandre attempts his first heist. It's a clever, daring plan…but he has no experience as a burglar. Will he pull it off?

A transcript of this episode is available at https://bit.ly/3ADyX4G.
